name: AES-NZ1005-STE-ITP-PMT-0012 - Natural Gas & LPG Gastight Air Pressure Test
template name: AES-NZ1005-STE-ITP-PMT-0012 - Natural Gas & LPG Gastight Air Pressure Test

name: PRE-COMMENCEMENT CHECKS FOR NATURAL GAS GASTIGHT AIR PRESSURE TEST
Natural Gas Reticulation (AECOM Specifications – NZT5007-STE-HSSP-0001) - CPB Hold Point
Conformance Criteria - Ensure Combined Services HDPE Natural Gas Pipework Installation Inspection and Testing Plan has been signed off prior to commencing Gastight Air Pressure Test.
Conformance Criteria - For all materials, a certificate of compliance shall be provided to the Client Rep. before the materials are incorporated into the works.
NATURAL GAS GASTIGHT AIR PRESSURE TEST – AS/NZ5601 Appendix E.4 Pipework Test Procedure
Natural Gas Gastight Air Pressure Test - CPB/AECOM/IR Hold Point
Referenced Documentation - AE Smith – Waikeria Prison Development Pressure Testing Procedure V1 Appendix D Schedule 11 WCT62
Conformance Criteria - 1. SYSTEM IS DISCONNECTED AT THE METER OR THE CYLINDER.
2. ALL OPEN-END CAPS ARE CAPPED OR PLUGGED?
4. SUITABLE TESTING INSTRUMENT CONNECTED. SERIAL No…………………….
5. RAISE PRESSURE TO 1.5 TIMES THE OPERATING PRESSURE
• Section 3 - NG- UT1 to FM3 , IND & SPO - @ 70kPa = 105 kPa
6. ISOLATE PRESSURE SOURCE AND ALLOW 2 MINUTES FOR THE TEMPERATURE OF THE TESTING MEDUIM TO STABILISE.
7. RECORD TEST START TIME AND GAUGE READING AND PHOTOGRAPH FOR:
• Section 1 – NG – Area 23 to UT1 - 50.52 HOURS at 315 kPa
• Section 2 - NG - UT1 to FM1: 1.13 HOURS at 105 kPa
• Section 3 - NG - UT1 to FM3: 15.27 HOURS at 105 kPa
• Section 4 LPG FM1 to LAU: 10 hours at 105 kPa
9. RECORD TEST END TIME AND GAUGE READING AND PHOTOGRAPH FOR
10. CALCULATE ADJUSTED TEST END PRESSURE. AND ANY PRESSURE LOSS
IF NO PRESSURE LOSS DURING THE PERIOD THE PIPEWORK CAN BE CONSIDERED GASTIGHT.
12. WCT 62 (a)(i)(H) IR to witness gas start test pressure.
13. WCT 62 (a)(i)(H) IR to witness gas end test pressure.
Records - Gastight Air Pressure Test Report / CONQA
Referenced Documentation - AE Smith – Waikeria Prison Development Pressure Testing Procedure V1 Schedule 11 WCT 62
• All pipework pressure test reports shall be provided to the Independent reviewer.
Records - FTR Gastight Air Pressure Test Report
Gas Certificate of compliance - CPB/AECOM/IR Hold Point
• GAS COC shall be provided to the Independent reviewer
